statements: SELECT * FROM hotel_supplies;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM hotel_supplies WHERE price > 50;
SELECT id, item_name, price FROM hotel_supplies ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT location, count(*) as total_items FROM hotel_supplies GROUP BY location;
SELECT * FROM hotel_supplies WHERE item_name LIKE 'Shampoo%';
SELECT * FROM hotel_supplies WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY price DESC, item_name ASC
SELECT id, item_name, quantity FROM hotel_supplies WHERE price <= 50 AND location = 'Main Lobby'
SELECT item_name, quantity, price FROM hotel_supplies WHERE location IN ('Kitchen', 'Poolside') AND quantity < 20 ORDER BY quantity ASC, price DESC
SELECT * FROM hotel_supplies WHERE location IS NOT NULL AND item_name LIKE 'Towel%' LIMIT 5
SELECT id, item_name, price FROM hotel_supplies WHERE quantity >= 15 AND (location = 'Front Desk' OR location = 'Storage Room') ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT * FROM hotel_supplies;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM hotel_supplies ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT amenity_name, available FROM amenities WHERE available = true;
SELECT item_name, quantity, location FROM hotel_supplies WHERE location = 'Room 101';
SELECT amenity_name, description FROM amenities WHERE description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY amenity_name;
SELECT * FROM hotel_supplies WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT item_name, location FROM hotel_supplies WHERE location = 'Room 101';
SELECT amenity_name FROM amenities WHERE description LIKE '%relaxation%';
SELECT * FROM hotel_supplies ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM hotel_supplies WHERE quantity < 5 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM hotel_supplies;
SELECT item_name, price FROM hotel_supplies ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity_in_stock FROM hotel_supplies WHERE quantity_in_stock > 0;
SELECT * FROM amenities WHERE in_use = TRUE;
SELECT amenity_name, quantity_available FROM amenities ORDER BY quantity_available;
SELECT item_name, price FROM hotel_supplies WHERE quantity_in_stock > 0;
SELECT amenity_name, quantity_available FROM amenities WHERE in_use = true;
SELECT item_name, quantity_in_stock, price FROM hotel_supplies ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT amenity_name, quantity_available FROM amenities WHERE quantity_available > 10;
SELECT item_name, price FROM hotel_supplies WHERE quantity_in_stock < 10;
SELECT * FROM hotel_supplies ORDER BY supply_name ASC, quantity DESC
SELECT supply_name, quantity FROM hotel_supplies WHERE quantity > 10
SELECT supply_name, supplier_id FROM hotel_supplies WHERE supplier_id IN (SELECT supplier_id FROM suppliers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%')
SELECT * FROM amenities ORDER BY location DESC, quantity ASC
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, address FROM suppliers WHERE contact_number LIKE '555%'
SELECT * FROM hotel_supplies WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY supply_name DESC;
SELECT supply_name, quantity FROM hotel_supplies WHERE supplier_id = 3 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT supply_name, amenity_name, location FROM hotel_supplies JOIN amenities ON hotel_supplies.supply_id = amenities.amenity_id WHERE quantity < 50;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_number FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (SELECT supplier_id FROM hotel_supplies WHERE quantity < 50);

SELECT supply_name, quantity, transaction_date FROM hotel_supplies JOIN supply_transactions ON hotel_supplies.supply_id = supply_transactions.supply_id WHERE supply_transactions.quantity > 10 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM hotel;
SELECT name, location FROM hotel WHERE rooms > 10;
SELECT id, location, rooms FROM hotel ORDER BY rooms DESC;
SELECT * FROM supplies WHERE price < 50.00;
SELECT name, description FROM amenities WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM hotel;
SELECT id, name, location FROM hotel ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT room_id, start_date, end_date FROM reservations WHERE status='confirmed';
SELECT name, quantity, price FROM supplies WHERE price >= 50;
SELECT a.name, a.description, o.quantity FROM amenities a INNER JOIN orders o ON a.id = o.amenity_id;
